H0.text: where do scottish people originate from. Vikings

H1.text: where do scottish people originate from. Picts

H2.text: where do scottish people originate from. Anglo-Saxons

H3.text: where do scottish people originate from. Celts

A4.text: The Picts are assumed to have been descendants of the Caledonii and other northern Iron Age tribes.

A5.text: A study published in 2023 observed 'broad affinities' between the mainland Pictish genomes, Iron Age Britons and the present-day people living in western Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and Northumbria, but less with the rest of England.
